channel.title: Search on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Search on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: FO - Search - Search product bar, consult autocomplete list
item.description: FO - Search - Search product bar, consult autocomplete list Details Component : Core Status : Automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5102 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/FO/hummingbird/07_search/01_consultAutoCompleteList.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Click on the search bar on the header > Write a word on it (min 3 characters length) * The autocomplete list is displayed with 2 products * The search bar in the header keeps the word written Click outside The autocomplete list is not displayed Case 1: With “Mug” products

item.title: FO - Search - Search a product and validate
item.description: FO - Search - Search a product and validate Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5103 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Click on the search bar on the header > Write a word on it (min 3 characters length) The autocomplete list is displayed with 3 products with all “notebook” characters on products title Case 1: Choose a product on the list

item.title: FO - Search - Search no result
item.description: FO - Search - Search no result Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5104 Steps Step Description Expected result Case 1: With less than 3 characters Go to FO > Click on the search bar on the header > Write a word on it (less than 3 characters length) and press on “Enter” No autocomplete is displayed The search bar in the header keeps the word written

item.title: FO - Search - Consult results list
item.description: FO - Search - Consult results list Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5105 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > In search bar type “mug” Search results for “mug” page is displayed Found 5 products Click on Mug The best is yet to come Mug The best is yet to come product page is displayed Click on Previous from your browser Search results for “mug” page is displayed

item.title: FO - Search - Sort results list
item.description: FO - Search - Sort results list Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5106 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > In search bar type “mug” Search results for “mug” page is displayed with 5 items found. Sorted by Relevance Sort by: Name, A to Z Items are sorted from A to Z Sort by: Name, Z to A Items are sorted from Z to A Sort by Price, low to high Items are sorted by Price, low to high Sort by Price, high to low Items are sorted by Price, high to low Sort by Relevance Items are sorted by Relevance

item.title: FO - Search - Consult product quickview
item.description: FO - Search - Consult product quickview Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5107 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > In search bar type “mug” Page Search results for “mug” is displayed Found 5 products Put your mouse over the product “Customizable mug” The button “Quickview” should be displayed Click on the “Quickview” button Product modal is displayed : * On the left : image of product
